comment.author: 33416664@N06
comment._content: Actually, I think it's the Austrian display, looking towards the entrance to the Hungarian one. They were obviously located in the same pavillion.

comment.author: 83979593@N00
comment._content:
Hello gabrieladelmann,

Thanks for the thoughts on this. We looked at various print and online resources and cannot answer this with certainty, but only have the Hongrie sign to identify the Hungary section and cannot be sure if this is the Austrian or Hungarian section.  Please let us know if you have found a source on this, so we can clarify if possible.

Ed & Angie, Brooklyn Museum Archives
